PyBaSiC - Background and Shading Correction of Optical Microscopy Images in Python¶

PyBaSiC is a microscopy image correction package in python (Matlab version can be found here). It achieves high-accuracy with significantly fewer input images, and works for diverse imaging conditions with no manual parameters required. Moreover, PyBaSiC can correct temporal drift in time-lapse microscopy data and thus improve continuous single-cell quantification. You can also find PyBaSiC as a Fiji/ImageJ plugin.
